**Government Tender Announcement: Einsa VAP-40E Aerial Loader Battery Assembly**
===========================================================

**Bid Solicitation Number:** W8486-249346/A
**Publication Date:** October 3, 2023
**Closing Date:** 14:00, October 31, 2023

**Project Description:**
The Department of National Defence requires the procurement of Einsa VAP-40E Aerial Loader Battery Assembly for delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton.

**Scope of Work:**

* Item 1: Battery Assembly, Part No. 40 669 301, Quantity 8, Unit of Issue: EA, Delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal
* Item 2: Battery Assembly, Part No. 40 669 301, Quantity 8, Unit of Issue: EA, Delivery to 7 CFSD Edmonton

**Option Order:**
The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Electronic Submission of Bids:**
This requirement uses electronic receipt of bids by e-mail only. Please submit your bid by e-mail to `DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca`.

**Queries and Debriefings:**
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process. Bidders should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of the results of the bid solicitation process.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and other trade agreements.

**Regions of Opportunity:**
Worldwide

**Regions of Delivery:**
Quebec (except NCR), Alberta

**Contracting Authority:**
Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Tanya McKenzie, tanya.mckenzie@forces.gc.ca, (343) 551-4285

**Notice URL:** None

**Attachments:**
* [W8486-249346 - Spare Parts - Battery - RFP Amendment 003](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21096/ott_lstl-6829291-v1-w8486-249346_-_spare
